summary.span: 封裝表單的資料來源。

span.span: Encapsulates the data source for a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件有許多用途。The component serves many purposes. 首先，它可簡化將控制項繫結至資料的表單上提供貨幣管理、 變更通知和 Windows Form 控制項與資料來源之間的其他服務。First, it simplifies binding controls on a form to data by providing currency management, change notification, and other services between Windows Forms controls and data sources. 這可以藉由附加元件至您的資料來源使用屬性。This is accomplished by attaching the component to your data source using the property. 對於複雜的繫結案例您可以選擇性地設定特定的資料行或清單資料來源中的屬性。For complex binding scenarios you can optionally set the property to a specific column or list in the data source. 您接著將控制項繫結至。You then bind controls to the . 與資料的所有進一步互動可在完成呼叫元件。All further interaction with the data is accomplished with calls to the component. 如需如何的範例可以簡化繫結程序，請參閱[如何： Windows Forms 控制項加以繫結至 DBNull 資料庫值](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-windows-forms-controls-to-dbnull-database-values.md)和[如何： 處理錯誤和使用資料繫結所發生的例外狀況](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-handle-errors-and-exceptions-that-occur-with-databinding.md).For examples on how the can simplify the binding process, see [How to: Bind Windows Forms Controls to DBNull Database Values](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-windows-forms-controls-to-dbnull-database-values.md) and [How to: Handle Errors and Exceptions that Occur with Databinding](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-handle-errors-and-exceptions-that-occur-with-databinding.md). 瀏覽和資料來源的更新透過完成方法這類， ，和。Navigation and updating of the data source is accomplished through methods such as , , and . 透過處理作業，例如排序和篩選和屬性。Operations such as sorting and filtering are handled through the and properties. 如需有關使用排序和篩選，請參閱 < [ 如何： 排序和篩選 ADO.NET 資料使用 Windows Forms BindingSource 元件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sort-and-filter-ado-net-data-with-wf-bindingsource-component.md)。For more information on using sorting and filtering with the , see [How to: Sort and Filter ADO.NET Data with the Windows Forms BindingSource Component](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sort-and-filter-ado-net-data-with-wf-bindingsource-component.md). 颾魤 ㄛ元件可以做為強類型的資料來源。In addition, the component can act as a strongly typed data source. 通常被固定的基礎資料來源類型，透過下列機制的其中一個：Typically the type of the underlying data source is fixed through one of the following mechanisms: - 使用方法，以將項目加入元件。Use the method to add an item to the component. - 設定清單、 單一物件，或類型的屬性。Set the property to a list, single object, or type. 這兩種機制建立強型別清單。Both of these mechanisms create a strongly-typed list. 如需有關如何使用若要繫結至型別，請參閱[如何： 將 Windows Forms 控制項繫結至型別](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-type.md)。For more information on how to use the to bind to a type, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Type](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-type.md). 您也可以使用將您的控制項繫結至 factory 物件。You can also use the to bind your controls to a factory object. 如需有關如何執行這項操作的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 將 Windows Forms 控制項繫結至 Factory 物件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-factory-object.md)。For more information on how to do this, see [How to: Bind a Windows Forms Control to a Factory Object](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-a-windows-forms-control-to-a-factory-object.md). > [!NOTE] > 因為處理這兩個簡單和複雜的資料來源術語會造成問題。Because a handles both simple and complex data sources, terminology is problematic. 在此類別文件中，詞彙*清單*是指資料集合，在裝載的資料來源中，和*項目*代表單一項目。Within this class documentation, the term *list* refers to a data collection within the hosted data source, and *item* denotes a single element. 當討論功能相關聯複雜的資料來源，對等的詞彙*表格*並*資料列*使用。When discussing functionality associated with complex data sources, the equivalent terms *table* and *row* are used. 提供存取基礎資料的成員。 provides members for accessing the underlying data. 可以透過擷取目前的項目屬性，然後將整個清單可以透過擷取屬性。The current item can be retrieved through the property, and the entire list can be retrieved through the property. 目前的項目，透過支援的編輯作業而， ，並和方法。Editing operations are supported on the current item through and the , , and and methods. 雖然貨幣管理會自動處理所有基礎資料來源類型，這個類別公開 （expose) 有多個事件，例如和，可讓自訂。Although currency management is handled automatically for all underlying data source types, this class exposes a number of events, such as and , that allow for customization. 繫結至資料來源元件也可瀏覽和管理與類別，可提供類似 VCR 的使用者介面 (UI) 用於巡覽清單項目。Data sources that are bound to a component can also be navigated and managed with the class, which provides a VCR-like user interface (UI) for navigating items within a list. 雖然可以繫結至任何資料來源，其設計用意與整合元件透過其屬性。Although can be bound to any data source, it was designed to integrate with a component through its property. 預設屬性類別是。The default property for the class is . 預設事件是。The default event is . > [!CAUTION] > 許多的成員清單類別所表示的基礎清單操作屬性，而且只參考其作業的基礎清單。Many of the members of the class operate on the underlying list represented by the property and simply refer their operation to the underlying list. 因此，當繫結至的自訂實作，這些成員的確切行為可能不同於類別文件中所述的行為。Therefore, when the is bound to a custom implementation of , the exact behavior of these members may differ from the behavior described in the class documentation. 例如，方法呼叫。For example, the method calls . 文件說明了解的方法可為基礎的方法已正確地實作。The documentation describes the method with the understanding that the method for the underlying is correctly implemented. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範繫結至。The following code example demonstrates a bound to a . 繫結至包含字型清單。The is bound to a that contains a list of fonts. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所表示的基礎清單中加入新的物件之前，就會發生事件屬性。The event occurs before a new object is added to the underlying list represented by the property. 此事件之後引發呼叫方法時，會建立新的項目，並將其加入基礎清單之前。This event is fired after the method is called, but before the new item is created and added to the underlying list. 藉由處理這個事件，程式設計人員可以提供自訂的項目建立及插入行為，而不會強制衍生自類別。By handling this event, the programmer can provide custom item creation and insertion behavior without being forced to derive from the class. 這藉由設定來完成的事件處理常式屬性參數，以新的項目。This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the property of the parameter to the new item. 在中建立新物件事件必須是相同的型別清單中包含的類型，或會發生例外狀況。The new object created in the event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur. 您無法設定當繫結至屬性或因為您無法新增新至清單。You cannot set the property when bound to a or because you cannot add a new to the list. 如需有關如何提供自訂的新項目功能的詳細資訊，請參閱方法。For more information about supplying custom new item functionality, see the method. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用元件繫結到清單控制項。The following code example uses a component to bind a list to a control. 新的項目加入至清單事件處理常式。New items are added to the list by the event handler. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows Forms BindingSource 自訂項目加入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會加入新項目所表示的基礎清單屬性。The method adds a new item to the underlying list represented by the property. 這個方法會設定一系列如下的動作：This method sets up the following series of actions: 1. 認可任何暫止的編輯作業，會自動呼叫方法。The method is automatically called to commit any pending edit operations. 2. 自動引發事件。The event is automatically raised. 可以以程式設計方式處理此事件，以建構新的項目。This event can be programmatically handled to construct the new item. 這藉由設定來完成的事件處理常式屬性參數，以新的項目。This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the property of the parameter to the new item. 在中建立新物件事件必須是相同的型別清單中包含的類型，或會發生例外狀況。The new object created in the event must be of the same type as the type contained in the list or an exception will occur. 如果無法處理事件，且基礎清單，然後將要求傳送至清單的方法。If the event is not handled, and the underlying list is an , then the request is passed to the list's method. 如果基礎清單不是 ，則會透過其公用預設建構函式自動建立項目。If the underlying list is not an , the item is automatically created through its public default constructor. 在任一情況下，新的項目加入清單的結尾。In either case, the new item is added to the end of the list. 3. 新的項目會立即加入至內部清單，除非資料來源實作介面。The new item is added immediately to the internal list unless the data source implements the interface. 在此情況下，新的項目未獲認可之前明確呼叫進行或新的清單作業啟始為止。In this case, the new item is not committed until an explicit call to is made or until a new list operation is initiated. 它會認可之前，新的項目可以回復藉由呼叫，在此情況下新增的項目會被捨棄。Before it is committed, the new item can be rolled back by calling , in which case the new item is discarded. 這個方法會引發事件。This method raises the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用元件繫結到清單控制項。The following code example uses a component to bind a list to a control. 新的項目加入至清單事件處理常式。New items are added to the list by the event handler. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows Forms BindingSource 自訂項目加入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為屬性取決於基礎資料來源類型。The default value for the property depends on the underlying data source type. 如果基礎清單實作介面，這個屬性會委派至基礎清單。If the underlying list implements the interface, this property will delegate to the underlying list. 否則，這個屬性會傳回`false`如果基礎清單有任何下列特性：Otherwise, this property will return `false` if the underlying list has any of the following characteristics: - 它有固定的大小，由屬性。It has a fixed size, as determined by the property. - 它是唯讀的由屬性。It is read-only, as determined by the property. - 項目的型別沒有預設建構函式。The item's type does not have a default constructor. > [!NOTE] > 一旦設定此屬性的值，getter 便不再參考基礎清單的呼叫。Once the value of this property is set, the getter no longer refers the call to the underlying list. 相反地，它只會傳回值，直到先前設定呼叫方法。Instead, it simply returns the value that was previously set until the method is called. 設定這個屬性會引發事件設定為。Setting this property raises the event with set to . 如果您設定屬性，以`true`基礎清單型別沒有預設建構函式，您必須處理事件，並建立適當的型別。If you set the property to `true` and the underlying list type does not have a default constructor, you must handle the event and create the appropriate type. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的屬性元件，以允許使用者將新的項目加入元件的基礎清單。The following code example demonstrates using the property of the component to permit the user to add new items to the component's underlying list. 將此屬性設定為`true`會導致繫結控制項來顯示其新的資料錄的資料列。Setting this property to `true` causes the bound control to display its row for new records. remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時屬性變更的任何原因如下：The event is raised whenever the property changes for any of the following reasons: - 目前的位置變更。The current position of the changes. - 或屬性變更。The or properties change. - 成員資格的基礎變更時，會造成來參考另一個項目。The membership of the underlying changes, which causes to refer to a different item. 範例包括新增或刪除在目前的項目，刪除或移動目前的項目本身，或將項目移至目前的位置之前的項目。Examples include adding or deleting an item before the current item, deleting or moving the current item itself, or moving an item to the current position. - 重新整理基礎清單的新排序或篩選作業。The underlying list is refreshed by a new sorting or filtering operation. 觸發此事件時，屬性都會包含其新值。When this event is triggered, the property will already contain its new value. 是的預設事件類別。 is the default event for the class. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可設定數目的資料來源，包括類型、 物件和類型的清單。The property can be set to a number of data sources, including types, objects, and lists of types. 產生的資料來源會公開為清單。The resulting data source will be exposed as a list. 下表顯示一些常見的資料來源和產生的清單評估。The following table shows some of the common data sources and the resulting list evaluation. |資料來源屬性DataSource property|清單結果List results| |-------------------------|------------------| |`null`|空白的物件。An empty of objects. 新增項目設定要加入的項目類型的清單。Adding an item sets the list to the type of the added item.| |`null` 使用設定`null` with set|不支援此項目，會引發。Not supported, raises .| |非清單型別或型別"T"的物件Non-list type or object of type "T"|空白的型別"T"。Empty of type "T".| |陣列執行個體Array instance| 包含陣列項目。 containing the array elements.| | 執行個體 instance|包含項目。An containing the items.| |列出執行個體，包含型別"T"List instance containing type "T"| 執行個體，包含型別"T"。 instance containing type "T".| 颾魤 ㄛ可以設定為其他清單類型這類並而會適當地處理它們。In addition, can be set to other list types such as and and the will handle them appropriately. 在此情況下，在清單中所包含的類型應該有一個預設建構函式。In this case, the type contained in the list should have a default constructor. 當設定資料來源，如果提供的參考都包含一個以上的清單或資料表時，您必須設定屬性設為指定要繫結至清單的字串。When setting a data source, if the supplied reference contains more than one list or table, you must set the property to a string that specifies the list to bind to. 設定這個屬性會引發事件。Setting this property raises the event. > [!NOTE] > 如果您進行任何變更屬性值，則應如此做以確保 UI 會反映所做的變更在使用者介面 (UI) 執行緒上。If you make any changes to the property value, you should do so on the user interface (UI) thread to ensure that the UI reflects the changes. 屬性是預設屬性，如類別。The property is the default property for the class. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會通知所有的控制項繫結至重新整理它們的值。The method informs all controls bound to the to refresh their values. 方法會引發至少一次事件;`metaDataChanged`參數表示的基礎變更本質。The method does this by raising the event at least once; the `metaDataChanged` parameter indicates the nature of the underlying change. - A`metaDataChanged`的值`true`表示的資料結構描述已變更。A `metaDataChanged` value of `true` indicates that the data schema of has changed. A事件引發設定為。A event is raised with set to . - A`metaDataChanged`的值`false`指出只有一個或多個項目的值已變更。A `metaDataChanged` value of `false` indicates that only the values of one or more items have changed. 值為何`metaDataChanged`，則引發事件設定為。Regardless of the value of `metaDataChanged`, a event is raised with set to . 如此一來，呼叫搭配參數`true`將會引發兩個事件。As a consequence, calling with a parameter of `true` will raise two events. 每當另一個成員會對資料繫結，例如設定中的重大變更會自動呼叫或屬性。 is automatically called whenever another member makes major changes to the data-binding, such as setting the or properties. 不過，程式設計人員也可以呼叫這個方法明確。However, the programmer can also call this method explicitly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用元件繫結陣列清單中，不會提供變更通知。The following code example uses a component to bind an array list, which does not provide change notification. 從清單中，移除項目，並繫結的控制項變更的告知呼叫方法。An item is removed from the list, and the bound controls are notified of the change by calling the method. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 使用 BindingSource 的 Windows Form 控制項中的反映資料來源更新](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/reflect-data-source-updates-in-a-wf-control-with-the-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Reflect Data Source Updates in a Windows Forms Control with the BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/reflect-data-source-updates-in-a-wf-control-with-the-bindingsource.md). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResumeBinding() cil managed

summary.span: 繼續資料繫結。

span.span: Resumes data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和允許暫時暫止和繼續資料繫結的簡單繫結案例中的兩種方法。 and are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple-binding scenario. 如果使用者必須能夠進行數個編輯資料欄位，驗證發生之前，您通常會暫止資料繫結。You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs. 比方說，如果必須變更一個欄位，根據第二個，但在此驗證的第一個欄位會造成錯誤的第二個欄位。For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error. > [!NOTE] > 使用防止變更發送到資料來源，直到會呼叫，但是不會實際阻止任何事件發生。Using prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring. 使用複雜資料繫結，例如的控制項控制項，更新其值變更事件這類事件，因此，呼叫不會防止它們接收到資料來源的變更。Controls that use complex data binding, such as the control, update their values based on change events such as the event, so calling will not prevent them from receiving changes to the data source. 基於這個理由，這並專用於簡單繫結控制項中這類控制項。For this reason, this and are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the control. 或者您可以使用這些方法在複雜繫結案例中如果要抑制事件，藉由設定屬性設`false`。Alternatively you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress events by setting the property to `false`.

span.span: A case-sensitive string containing the column name followed by "ASC" (for ascending) or "DESC" (for descending).

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會區分大小寫的字串，指定用來排序資料列，以及排序方向的資料行名稱。The property is a case-sensitive string that specifies the column names used to sort the rows, along with the sort direction. 根據預設會遞增排序資料行。Columns are sorted ascending by default. 多個資料行可以以逗號分隔，例如`"State, ZipCode DESC"`。Multiple columns can be separated by commas, such as `"State, ZipCode DESC"`. 若要支援排序，必須實作的基礎清單或介面。To support sorting, the underlying list must implement the or interfaces. 這項功能可透過查詢屬性。This capability can be queried through the property. 多重資料行排序時可以使用屬性是`true`。Multicolumn sorting is available when the property is `true`. 設定屬性會變更內部根據其類型清單：Setting the property will change the internal list depending on its type: - 如果清單是型別，則和屬性會設定在內部的清單。If the list is of type , the and properties are set in the internal list. - 如果清單是型別，則屬性設定。If the list is of type , the property is set. 排序字串不是時，才會變更內部清單的排序屬性`null`。The internal list's sort properties are only changed when the sort string is not `null`. `get`存取子，這個屬性將不會擷取內部清單的排序值; 相反地，它會傳回`set`存取子的值。The `get` accessor for this property will not retrieve the sort value of the internal list; instead, it will return the `set` accessor value. 值屬性會保存資料來源變更時。The value of the property will persist when the data source changes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以執行基本排序。The following example shows how to use the property to perform basic sorting with a . 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`PopulateDataViewAndSort`從表單的建構函式或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `PopulateDataViewAndSort` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. 應該在匯入您的表單和命名空間。Your form should import the and namespaces. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會認可暫止的加入先前加入至集合中所指定之索引處的項目`position`。The method commits a pending addition of an item previously added to the collection at the index specified by `position`. `position`參數是必要的因為數個新的項目可以同時暫止。The `position` parameter is necessary because several new items can be simultaneously pending.
